about_the_game:
It is not easy to catch the best fish the first time. Being a good fisherman requires patience. Start with a small rod and worm. Fish and mysteries will earn you more money. A tough challenge awaits you with 3 different fishing skill games.

Experience more excitement by buying new bait and rods from the market to discover new fish. Earn the chance to catch more mysterious and valuable fish with special fishing rods. You should choose your baits well. Smart fish notice these baits immediately. You should become professional to fool them.

Catching special fish earns more money. Therefore, you can earn money faster by developing. Although catching valuable and mysterious fish is fun, their size is also very important. Progress on the path of professional fishing for both valuable and big fish...

name: Fishing Clicker Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
